Class EmbeddedAdminCtrImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.glassfish.kernel.embedded.EmbeddedAdminCtrImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

public class EmbeddedAdminCtrImpl
extends Object
implements EmbeddedAdminContainer

      • bind

        public void bind(Port port,
        String protocol)
        Description copied from interface: EmbeddedContainer
        Binds a port using a specific protocol to this container.
        Specified by:
        bind in interface EmbeddedContainer
        Parameters:
        port - the port instance to bind
        protocol - the protocol the port should be used for, can be null and the container can use the port for any protocol(s) it needs to.
